org.jgentleframework.configure.objectmeta
Class ObjectConstantImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.jgentleframework.configure.objectmeta.ObjectConstantImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObjectConstant
public class ObjectConstantImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObjectConstant

This class represents an ObjectConstant specifying dependency mapping to the given unique names.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
